text: Won n wi pe: “Meta ni won. Aja won sikerin won.” Won tun n wi pe: "Marun-un ni won. Aja won sikefa won." Oro t’o pamo fun won (ni won n so). Won tun n wi pe: “Meje ni won. Aja won sikejo won.” So pe: "Oluwa mi nimo julo nipa onka won. Ko si (eni ti) o mo (onka) won afi awon die. Nitori naa, ma se ba won se ariyanjiyan nipa (onka) won afi (ki o fi) ariyanjiyan (naa ti sibi eri) t’o yanju (ti A sokale fun o yii). Ma si se bi eni kan ninu won leere nipa (onka) won
